title: Everything Must Go! TPC’s Entire Inventory is Now Officially Up for Public Auction
content:
Back around the end of September, The Pro’s Closet (TPC) announced it was closing its doors come October. Well, I just got an email from Gabriel Prado, the Founder and CEO of LocalAuctions.com with a press release announcing the liquidation and public auction of everything in TPC’s old facility. See below for details.

If you’re interested in taking part in the auction, you can check out the online-only auction on the Local Auctions website. Bidding is taking place now through Wednesday, October 23rd at noon.

If you are local, you can preview the items in person on Tuesday, October 22nd from 9 am to 3 pm. The address of TPC’s facility is: 1900 Taylor Ave, Louisville, Colorado, 80027

“The winning bidders are required to pick up and remove their items on Thursday 10/24/24 through Wednesday 10/30/24 from 9 am to 5 pm. For more information and to view the items in the auction, visit the Local Auctions Website“

LocalAuctions.com

The post Everything Must Go! TPC’s Entire Inventory is Now Officially Up for Public Auction appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Ron Frazelle
